subject: From the desk of: Mr.John C. W
body:
From the desk of: Mr.John C. Williams
Chief Executive Officer of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York
Financial center fund release department,
Contact Email: 
johncwilliams046@gmail.com
Attention Dear Valued Customer.
This is to acknowledge the receipt of an ATM card order, in respect with the provision act of degree 114 of the 1999 constitution; I am directed to inform you that your payment verification is confirmed. Therefore, we write to inform you that an arrangement is in progress to affect your ATM payment as soon as possible and in our bid for transparency. We just concluded a meeting with the entire Payment Committee of the inter-switch technology, and at this conclusion we had to contact you right away. Following your swift response to the email, we had to write to you in order to fully enlighten you on the accurate step to take for you to gain full possession of the ATM card.
It's my pleasure to inform you that the ATM Card Number: 4187 6219 1845 3910 has been approved and issued to you and your Pin code is (9060). Your Personal Identification Number is not known, the ATM Card Value is USD15,500,000 Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars You are allowed to withdraw a value of USD25,000.00 is permitted per Day, from any ATM Center of your choice in any part of the world.
We have securely sealed and packaged your ATM CARD for security reasons which makes it impossible for anyone to view it, until its been delivered to you, upon the option of delivery chosen by you to be fully insured by Nicon Insurance Corporation upon payment confirmation of your delivery charges. You are requested to choose from the options listed below your choice and cost of mailing, to enable us dispatch your ATM parcel. There are different express channels for delivery. Kindly see below the charges required to pay including insurance fee added and choose the one that is most convenient to you.
(1)  DHL COURIER COMPANY Shipping fee: USD50.00 48 Hours delivery
(2)  FedEx COURIER COMPANY Shipping fee: USD75.00 24 Hours delivery
PAYMENT TERMS: We do not accept cash on delivery COD proposal for such package Air sure charge for onward delivery must be paid through our choice of service to our office as instructed within a period of five working days after the receipt of this mail, do make urgent contact upon the receipt of this mail on the option you have choose.
NOTE: Your ATM is protected by a hard cover insurance policy, which makes it impossible to deduct any amount. This means that the above charges cannot be deducted from the ATM CARD and hence must be provided by you because you are an international ATM card value owner, before the ATM is delivered to you. This is in accordance with section 999 of the national act as adopted in 1998 and amended on 3rd July 2002 by the constitutional assembly. This is to protect and to avoid misappropriation of the ATM Card. Be informed that delivery will be made to your address after the confirmation of this payment for delivery, as you know that the delivery fee receipt will be attached to your payment delivery documents to avoid being delayed. Send your response to us immediately to indicate your option of delivery within 24 hrs, you only have 3 days to claim this ATM CARD and after this period, your CARD will be deemed to have been forfeited by you.
NOTE: YOU ARE ADVISED TO SELECT FROM THE OPTIONS OF DELIVERY AND RESPOND BACK WITH THE PAYMENT FOR IMMEDIATELY DELIVERY OF YOUR ATM CARD.
Treat urgently as we also remind you that your ATM Card is ready for .
Congratulations.
Mr. John C. Williams
Chief Executive Officer of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York
Contact Email: 
johncwilliams046@gmail.com

subject: Re: From the desk of: Mr.John C. W
body:
Dear Mr. John C. Williams,

Thank you for your email and the information provided regarding the ATM card. I am pleased to hear that the payment has been confirmed.

However, before proceeding further, I would like to clarify a few points:

1) You mentioned that my personal number is not known. Could you please explain what this means and how it might affect my ability to use the ATM card?

2) Regarding the delivery options, could you provide more details? Specifically, I would like to know the exact costs associated with each option (DHL Courier Company and Courier Company).

3) Lastly, could you confirm whether there are any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: From the desk of: Mr.John C. W
body:
Hello Mr. James

Thank you for your email response. However, be informed that after the
joint meeting we had today with the Funds Authorization presidency and US
Department Of Treasury and UN OFFICE we have concluded that you will have
to open Non resident online banking account in order to receive your funds
for easy and immediately release order version which is the best way
possible without any stop order.

Once you set up the online banking account then you will make out transfer
funds from your online banking account to your personal bank account or any
other Banks worldwide.

Upon your response then I will provide you with the information to contact
with the Online banking Department Unit Office who is in the position to
Authorization your online banking account to enable you to have Non
Resident account with in order to receive your funds.
Best regards
Mr. John C. Williams

subject: Hello Mr. James
body:
